FuncDef: This command creates individual counters for the specified FCs with regard for profile. All countable packets that match a configured FC and are deemed to be in-profile will be included in this counter.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to eight names of the FC for which to create an individual profile-aware counter. In order for the counter to be used, the config>oam-pm>session> ethernet>priority command must be configured with a numerical value representing the FC name (7 = NC, 6 = H1, 5 = EF, 4 = H2, 3 = L1, 2 = AF, 1 = L2, 0 = BE), and the config>oam-pm>session>ethernet>lmm>enable-fc-collection command must be enabled. Values-nc, h1, ef, h2, l1, af, l2, be.
